ygData.subject: Dream site for items
ygData.msgSnippet: Excellent, just the type of info was looking for.  How would I determine level base for items?  Would it be level they could be/have been purchased at.
ygData.messageBody:
Excellent, just the type of info was looking for. How would I determine
level base for items? Would it be level they could be/have been purchased
at. Average pricing I can definitely do. I could allow people to submit
how much they paid for an item and on what server so that you can even get
an average for the server you play on. Would something similar for level
work? Let people input what level they obtained an item at and create an
average?

Everyone out there: What would your dream site for items be? What would
you want it to contain?


-----Original Message-----
From: suzkim@... [mailto:suzkim@...]
Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 10:10 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] items site?


Okay,
If I would have my dream site for equiptment and such

Level based - what equiptment armor/weapons => someone who is wondering
what to get at each level(s) could go there and see.
Stat impoving - say I want to know how to up my stats for str, agi, dex,
sta what weapons/armor/jewelry/misc - where/who/how to get plus some
explinations about how each stat improvement can improve warrior's
performance.
Quest based - items that can only be gotten through quests
Purchasable items - average pricing
Player Trade/purchased - price should pay for these

That site I like for the message board. Get good tips and such from there.

Suz

Trent Carroll wrote:


So does the site have everything you need? Are the items arranged in
a good order? As far as items goes could it be better?
